thread.section_title: OptiContacts.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OptiContacts.com | opticontacts.com | 2 of 522
thread.title: BRIAN MOSS

author: BRIAN MOSS
title: BRIAN MOSS
text: I wasn't so sure at first, but other reviews seemed to be positive. The day after placing my order I received an email saying that I had sent in my eyeglass prescription instead of my contact prescription (embarrassing). However, they called my doctor to confirm the contact prescription and got my contacts in the mail right away. I received them 2 days later and they work great! All for the cheapest price anywhere! Thank you so much!
